• Multiplayer mining game with real-time WebSocket/MQTT networking.
  • Procedurally generated infinite map with multiple ore tiers and building mechanics.
  • Full-featured shop system for upgrades, consumables, and explosives.
  • Cloud sync via Puter for cross-device save sharing.
  • Responsive design with mobile controls and touch support.

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring procedurally generated worlds, real-time networking via MQTT, and cross-device cloud saves. Players explore, mine resources, build structures, and upgrade their equipment while competing on leaderboards. The game includes a comprehensive shop system, teleporters for fast travel, and supports both desktop and mobile controls.
